Item.Name: Canon EOS 5D Mark III
Item.Description: Newly designed 22.3 Megapixel full-frame CMOS sensor, 14-bit A/D conversion, wide range ISO setting 100-25600 (L:50, H1: 51200, H2: 102400) for shooting from bright to dim light and next generation DIGIC 5+ Image Processor for enhanced noise reduction and exceptional processing speed.

Item.Name: Panasonic LUMIX DMC-ZS19 Digital Camera
Item.Description: 14.1 megapixels 3.0 TFT Touch Screen LCD Display POWER O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer) suppresses the low-frequency vibration hand-shake component, which is physically generated when pressing the shutter button or when shooting at night with a slow shutter speed.

Item.Name: Polaroid 300 Instant Camera PIC-300B
Item.Description: This camera allows you to take pictures you'll see developed in front of your eyes in minutes. It's the modern version of the classic Polaroid instant camera you've grown to love and it's just in time for your wedding, anniversary, birthday or other big event!

Item.Name: Canon EF 16-35mm f/2.8L II USM Ultra Wide Angle Zoom Lens
Item.Description: 16-35mm ultra-wide-angle zoom lens with f/2.8 maximum aperture,3 high-precision aspherical lens elements produce superior image quality.

Item.Name: Pentax WG-3 Kit
Item.Description: Designed to handle the rigors of just about any activity, it's waterproof for aquatic adventures, shockproof to take spills in stride, freeze-proof for hitting the slopes, dust-proof to handle desert conditions, and crush-proof in case it ends up at the bottom of your pack or pinned between you and a rock face.

Item.Name: Taylor Made Golf- R11s Driver Left-Handed
Item.Description: With a maximum sized titanium clubhead (460cc) and a Thick-Thin Crown design, the R11S lowers the Center of Gravity (CG) for increased swing speed and longer distances off the tee.

Item.Name: Mens RH TaylorMade Complete Golf Set Clubs Driver, Fairway Wood, Hybrid, Irons, Putter Deluxe Stand Bag Taylor Made R11 Stiff
Item.Description: Brand New complete set of all the best TaylorMade Golf Clubs.

Item.Name: Bionic StableGrip Golf Glove
Item.Description: The only golf glove designed by an orthopedic hand surgeon, the Bionic StableGrip Golf Glove feels and fits like second skin.

Item.Name: True Linkswear True Sensei Golf Shoes (9, Black/Charcoal)
Item.Description: The TRUE sensei was designed to function at a TOUR level on the course, while also providing a super comfortable platform and breathable upper that would allow golfers to wear it off the course on trails, the road, while traveling or at the gym.

Item.Name: Nike Golf Victory Red Pro Hybrids
Item.Description: VR Pro Hybrids have been created to meet the specific needs of the best players in the world. Nike adjusted the face angle and shifted the center of gravity to optimize workability and distance. Split compressions channel and an ultra thin face combine to deliver tour-level performance.

Item.Name: 2012-13 Manchester United Away Shirt Soccer Jersey
Item.Description: Manchester United jersey away, adult size

Item.Name: Manchester United Man Utd 12-13 2012-2013 Home Soccer Jersey
Item.Description: Manchester United jersey home, adult size

Item.Name: Uhlsport Super Lite Soccer Shinguards
Item.Description: The Uhlsport Pro Classic Soccer Goalkeeper Shorts have an elastic waistband with inner drawstring and extended hip padding to protect the most vulnerable area during diving and sliding saves.

Item.Name: Diamondback 2013 Overdrive V 29'er Mountain Bike with 29-Inch Wheels
Item.Description: The bike industry often sees fads come and go. Innovation doesn't always assure success or even relevance for that matter. But the 29er revolution seems to be one that's here to stay and for good reason.

Item.Name: Spalding NBA Street Basketball
Item.Description: This basketball has been specifically design to withstand the severity of outdoor street play. It is made with a durable rubber cover so it holds up over a long period of time, no matter how rough the terrain.

Item.Name: Marcy Diamond Elite Standard Bench
Item.Description: An all-in-one bench, the Marcy Diamond Elite Standard Bench lets you exercise most major muscle groups. An adjustable preacher curl bicep pad, an adjustable four-position back pad, and a dual-function leg developer with pivot points that align with your knee joints all combine to give you a comprehensive workout.

Item.Name: Bowflex SelectTech 552 Adjustable Dumbbells
Item.Description: Newly designed, the innovative pair of 552 SelectTech Dumbbells combines 15 sets of weights into one using a unique dial system.

Item.Name: Fender FA-100 Acoustic Guitar
Item.Description: Laminated Spruce Top with Laminated Agathis back and sides

Item.Name: Fender Starcaster Start Electric Guitar Starter Pack, Sunburst
Item.Description: Gloss 3 tone sunburst finish, Maple neck with 22 fret rosewood fingerboard, 3 single coil pickups, Pack includes, guitar, 10 watt amplifier, strings, strap, cable and picks.

Item.Name: Marshall MG4 Carbon Series MG30CFX 30 Watt Guitar Combo Amplifier 1x10 Combo with 4 Programmable Channels, Effects, MP3 Input
Item.Description: 30 Watts, 1x10 combo, 4 programmable channels, effects and MP3 input.

Item.Name: Roland RD-300nx Digital Piano Bundle
Item.Description: This package comes with the Roland RD-300nx Digital Piano and all items packaged with it by the manufacturer, two Sonic Sense 10' 1/4" instrument cables, and an Ultimate Support JS-502D keyboard stand

Item.Name: Yamaha PSR Series PSRS750 61-Key Portable Keyboard
Item.Description: Powerful and hi-fidelity sound with increased speaker box size for full-sounding low end, Digital Amplifiers for great power efficiency and Digital EQ for precise tonal adjustment.

Item.Name: Korg AW-2G-OR Clip On Chromatic Guitar Tuner Orange
Item.Description: Clip-on chromatic tuner mounts directly to any guitar headstock - even when tapered. Double ball-joint mounting places display at an easy-to-see angle.

Item.Name: Apple MacBook Pro MD102LL/A 13.3-Inch Laptop (NEWEST VERSION)
Item.Description: 2.9 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i7 processor, 8 GB DDR3 RAM; 750 GB Hard Drive, 13.3 inch LED-backlit display, 1280-by-800 resolution.

Item.Name: Apple iPad with Retina Display MD510LL/A (16GB, Wi-Fi, Black)
Item.Description: 9.7 Retina Display; 2048 x 1536 Resolution, Apple iOS 6; Dual-Core A6X Chip with Quad-Core Graphics.

Item.Name: Nokia Lumia 710 - Black
Item.Description: The Nokia Lumia 710 is the second Nokia Windows Phone and what makes it different is its affordability paired with nearly the same guts as the Nokia Lumia 800. The Lumia 710 also comes with a 3.7" display, exchangeable back covers for distinct looks, but the body itself will come in black and white.

Item.Name: Kindle Fire Tablet
Item.Description: 7" multi-touch color display; 1024x600 pixel resolution at 169 ppi, IPS (in-plane switching) technology

Item.Name: Acer Aspire V5-571PG-9814 15.6-Inch
Item.Description: At only 1" slim and super light, this Notebook packs potent power and graphics and even features an optical drive and handy LAN/VGA combo port, while integrating a touchscreen for exciting hands on navigation.

Item.Name: Microsoft Surface Pro Windows 8 Pro 128 Gb Tablet
Item.Description: Supports the full Office experience Run Outlook, Word, SharePoint Designer, PowerPoint and more. (Office applications sold separately.) Intel® CoreTM i5-3317U processor Features a 1.7GHz processor speed. 10.6" ClearType HD touch-screen display 1920 x 1080 resolution.

Item.Name: ASUS Nexus 7 Tablet (7-Inch, 32GB, Brown)
Item.Description: Nexus 7 was created for mobile gamers. With an NVIDIA Tegra 3 quad-core processor, everything is faster - pages load quickly, gameplay is smooth and responsive, and running multiple apps is a breeze.

Item.Name: Samsung Galaxy Note II 4G Android Phone
Item.Description: Samsung Galaxy Note II is a high-performance device that boasts many rich features and is indispensable when it comes to entertainment and productivity thanks to the S Pen.

Item.Name: Sony Playstation 3 Slim 250GB
Item.Description: High-Definition Blu-ray player for the best movie experience

Item.Name: Playstation Move Motion Controller
Item.Description: Accurately tracks your every movement. Precisely tracks both fast and subtle movements

Item.Name: Wireless Stereo Headset
Item.Description: Accurately tracks your every movement. Precisely tracks both fast and subtle movements

Item.Name: NBA 2K13
Item.Description: Compete in tournaments, and play through regular seasons

Item.Name: PS3 Gran Turismo 5 XL Edition
Item.Description: Build a dream collection from over 1,000 of the world's most exciting cars, from exotic imports to muscle cars and performance supercars, to customize, race, and upgrade.

Item.Name: Persona 4 Arena
Item.Description: Characters and settings from award-winning Persona 3 & 4: Beautiful, hand-drawn 2D anime-style sprites of characters based on the award-winning Persona 3 and 4 roleplaying games are a special treat for both Atlus and genre fans.

Item.Name: Kinect Sensor
Item.Description: Easily hook up with friends with Video Kinect, no headset required. Sign into your profile by just stepping in front of the sensor
